Posts.Content: Dec 22, 2011 07:19AM Beach_glass wrote: Yes, I did call but the office was closed, I left a message though. Another day has gone by & still no word. So, focusing on the hussel of shopping for gifts. I have 3 kids or should I say adult kids, I haven't mentioned a word to them. I figure that there's enough worrying going on between me & my husband. I feel guilty when I talk to other people about my worries but that's the way I want it for now. So, is no news really good news?
Posts.Title: So who is waiting for test results/ or having test Tenmom Kimberly5307

Posts.Content: Dec 21, 2011 12:51PM Beach_glass wrote: I had a biopsy last Tuesday & no word yet. It's been pretty difficult to go day by day without worrying. My breast screening turned into another mammogram & ultra sound then my biopsy in November. So, today a week has gone by. They say that no news is good news - I sure hope so :)
